main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 30 April 1957 in Seattle, Washington. The object was described as a globular, white with a green tinge, moving rapidly through the sky.
interesting points: The observation lasted only 1 second, and the object was noted as having movement similar to that of a bolide, which is a large meteor.
The rapid movement of the object was compared to that of a comet, traveling from east to northwest in a straight path.
The report mentions that the same observation had been made a year and a half ago, indicating a recurring phenomena in the area.
The witnesses described the underside of the object as lighter and flatter, with marks similar to two half-moons.
Senior controller and observers were present during the sighting, noting that the bright stars made the ceiling appear unlimited.
sighted object: globular, white with a green tinge UFO moving rapidly through the sky
